h2_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top
content: Inside Bishui Cave, Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top are the first bosses you'll encounter. You'll get to them just after the Purge Pit Keeper's Shrine
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Secret Bosses in Chapter 5', specifically from the subsection 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top'.
The content is as follows:
Inside Bishui Cave, Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top are the first bosses you'll encounter. You'll get to them just after the Purge Pit Keeper's Shrine
